title: AI tutors to be rolled out to UK schools in just two years in bid to help needy pupils
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) tutors will be made available to schools in just two years, the Government has confirmed.
content:
Teachers and AI labs will work together to create tuition tools using the new tech this summer, with a view to rolling them out before the end of 2027.

title: EU Probes Musk's AI Chatbot Grok Over Sexual Deepfakes
description: After his artificial intelligence chatbot Grok spewed nonconsensual sexualized deepfake images on X, the European Union opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's social media platform on Monday.
content:

title: Lawyer apologizes for AI-generated errors in murder case
description: A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
content:
